original_title: Si me entero que algún día sufres regresaré por ti
overview: In her younger years, Rebeca's boyfriend left for the United States but promised to return and marry her. Seventeen years later, he reappears to keep his promise and have a wedding. As she prepares for the ceremony, Rebeca takes stock of a life spent waiting in a village where she can no longer remain.
title: If I Hear That Someday You Suffer, I'll Come Back For You
